name: World War Ages (Pre-Pre-Alpha)
description:
"Some say ignorance is bliss. I prefer to think ignorance is attack without warning. The world needs to be ruled by one single ruler, that everyone may be in coordination. Such was promised me when I was a young child. What do you think?"

World War Ages is not even in Pre-Alpha. The walking took hours to polish, so it'll be a while until everything is set into full story motion. The game will be about you attempting to take over the world. The scene you may imagine is a bloody, gory scene, but that's not going to be the case. This game will be totally SFW, and hopefully E10+ as there's no possible way to make war into an E rated game.

For now, though, we're keeping the full story in close containment, so you won't understand anything unless you are a SUPER hardcore theorist.

[-] v0.0.1:

-Implemented polished walking

-Made graphics for the ground and player objects.

[-] v0.0.2:

-Implemented a basic attack system (Currently SPACE for attack)

-Implemented sprinting (You can run infinitely with no stamina being implemented (yet)...)

-You can press 1 for true fullscreen mode.

[x] v0.03 (NOT OUT YET):

-Adding enemy (Maybe?)

-Adding gamepad support (You'll have to test that.)

-There's currently a typo in one of the files. See if you can find it. :D

-And some more!
